description: Returns a list of restore testing selections. Can be filtered by MaxResults and RestoreTestingPlanName.

parameters.name: RestoreTestingPlanName
parameters.description: Returns restore testing selections by the specified restore testing plan name.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned items. For example, if a request is made to return MaxResults number of items, NextToken allows you to return more items in your list starting at the location pointed to by the nexttoken.

nested_items.name: RestoreTestingSelections
nested_items.description: The returned restore testing selections associated with the restore testing plan.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a restore testing selection was created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26,2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that Backup uses to create the target resource; for example: arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.

nested_items.name: ProtectedResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource included in a restore testing selection; for example, an Amazon EBS volume or an Amazon RDS database.

nested_items.name: RestoreTestingPlanName
nested_items.description: Unique string that is the name of the restore testing plan.

nested_items.name: RestoreTestingSelectionName
nested_items.description: Unique name of a restore testing selection.

nested_items.name: ValidationWindowHours
nested_items.description: This value represents the time, in hours, data is retained after a restore test so that optional validation can be completed.
